TRACKER_STATS_RECENT_HEADING.title: Blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last 24 hours
TRACKER_STATS_RECENT_HEADING.note: Header above a list of trackers (or tracking companies) that have been blocked in the past 24 hours.

TRACKER_STATS_MENU_TITLE.title: Blocked Tracking Attempts
TRACKER_STATS_MENU_TITLE.note: Used as a toggle label in a page customization menu

TRACKER_STATS_RECENT_HEADING_HOUR.title: Blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last hour
TRACKER_STATS_RECENT_HEADING_HOUR.note: Header above a list of trackers (or tracking companies) that have been blocked in the past hour.

TRACKER_STATS_NUM_ATTEMPTS_SINGULAR.title: 1 attempt
TRACKER_STATS_NUM_ATTEMPTS_SINGULAR.note: Number of tracking attempts blocked, when there's only 1

TRACKER_STATS_NO_ACTIVITY.title: Tracking attempts blocked by DuckDuckGo appear here. Keep browsing to see how many we block.
TRACKER_STATS_NO_ACTIVITY.note: Placeholder for when we cannot report any blocked trackers yet

TRACKER_STATS_NO_RECENT_ACTIVITY.title: No trackers blocked in the last 24 hours
TRACKER_STATS_NO_RECENT_ACTIVITY.note: Heading for the tracker/companies list when we have observed trackers, but none in the last 24 hours

TRACKER_STATS_NO_RECENT_ACTIVITY_HOUR.title: No trackers blocked in the last hour
TRACKER_STATS_NO_RECENT_ACTIVITY_HOUR.note: Heading for the tracker/companies list when we have observed trackers, but none in the last hour

TRACKER_STATS_INFO_TT_LABEL.title: DuckDuckGo blocks trackers on websites you visit, including trackers from companies like Google and Facebook, who often try to track you on other websites.
TRACKER_STATS_INFO_TT_LABEL.note: An information popup explaining that we block trackers

TRACKER_STATS_NO_RECENT.title: No recent tracking activity
TRACKER_STATS_NO_RECENT.note: Placeholder to indicate that nothing was blocked in the last 24 hours

TRACKER_STATS_COUNT_BLOCKED_SINGULAR.title: 1 tracking attempt blocked
TRACKER_STATS_COUNT_BLOCKED_SINGULAR.note: The main headline indicating that 1 tracker was blocked

TRACKER_STATS_COUNT_BLOCKED_PLURAL.title: {count} tracking attempts blocked
TRACKER_STATS_COUNT_BLOCKED_PLURAL.note: The main headline indicating that more than 1 attempt has been blocked. Eg: '2 tracking attempts blocked'

TRACKER_STATS_FEED_COUNT_BLOCKED_SINGULA.title: 1 attempt blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last 24 hours
TRACKER_STATS_FEED_COUNT_BLOCKED_SINGULA.note: A summary description of how many tracking attempts where blocked, when only one exists.

TRACKER_STATS_FEED_COUNT_BLOCKED_PLURAL.title: {count} attempts blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last 24 hours
TRACKER_STATS_FEED_COUNT_BLOCKED_PLURAL.note: A summary description of how many tracking attempts where blocked, when there was more than 1. Eg: '1,028 attempts blocked by DuckDuckGo in the last 24 hours'

TRACKER_STATS_TOGGLE_LABEL.title: Show recent activity
TRACKER_STATS_TOGGLE_LABEL.note: The aria-label text for a toggle button that shows/hides the detailed feed
